AjR_ZdY74NvfhDAT4PTesQ.text: It take a lot for me to really go off on a place.  A LOT.  But Brazewells has earned my displeasure.    Let me start with at least one positive.  Kelly, behind the bar, is awesome.  She's friendly and knows her stuff.  And that, my fellow yelpers, is where the redeeming qualities end.  Rarely have I been where the waitstaff was so clueless and uncaring.  "May I see a wine list?".. "Oh, uhh.. well, we don't really have one right now... sorry."  *crickets*  Are you kidding me?  if I had been here once and heard this, I probably wouldn't mention it, but over a 3-4 month period, I heard this more than once.  My other major complaint is that many of the servers are just rude.  I'll grant, however, that if I had to put up with the usual crowd they draw, I may be, too.    After visiting this place on a Saturday night, I knew it'd be my last visit.  The back patio was WAY overcrowded and packed with self-absorbed douches.  Rudeness gets elevated almost to an art form back there.  Beware, they also allow smoking back there.  Just.. eww!  As we were trying to leave, I had people actually refuse to move so that I could step down off the patio.  Seriously??  Why are there bouncers here?  All they did was watch as I struggled to navigate the insanity.  Skip this drunk and douche infested place and walk across the street to Ten Park Lanes, instead.  You deserve better.

twMiPjuxO3Fka50Eva56lg.text: Staff is incredibly friendly and the wings are delicious. This is my go to spot to watch NFL games on Sunday. They also have one of the best patios on Montford.

znek78btbfuanA1Mgk_PRQ.text: Good service. Top notch wingz. Great afternoon weather. Mimosas were good but they basically shanked my pants to my ankles by not offering the whole carafe and letting me pay 2 hard earned dollar bills for one of the baby sized mimosas. Other than that all around helluva time!

photos.caption: Photo of Brazwells Premium Pub - Charlotte, NC, United States. This right here is the aftermath of me and my dawgs slaying some wings.

UcTCB9YgCwDJBQtV48yQZw.text: One of my fav hangouts after work. Half price apps are great. Lots to choose. Great service and beautiful people. Definitely Premo bar ! Craft beer but mostly in bottle. Few popular drafts. Outside area in back is awesome in rain or shine and they have heaters when it's cool out. Check it out !

D9ancJrpI85qaF48HJt30g.text: This is one of my favorite Sunday brunch spots.  There is lots of outdoor seating and plenty of TVs, outside and inside, to watch football.  Get there early though because it'll be busy.   Great drink specials for Sunday brunch, too. They have $4 mimosas and a Bloody Mary bar so you can customize your drink with as many olives, peppers and okra as you want.

E56-oPMnMa4ihqyjykBARw.text: My wife and I eat here about three times a week, since we live around the corner. We love the atmosphere and most of the staff. We've decided to stop spending our time and money at this establishment due to one of their managers Bryan/ Brian. He is by far the rudest, worst manager in any business we've ever come across. He obliviously lacks the correct training or education to manage in any business, he needs to choose a different occupation. Maybe the owners should help him with that decision or they'll end up losing more customers.

7IOP0SYYzqSpeJcMUdSizA.text: I definitely recommend this place. There ahi tuna is amazing and so are there salads and burgers. This has become my husband and my fall back bar. They were nice enough to change one of the t.v.'s for us so we could watch our mac conference team play.   There chicken wings are also amazing but beware of the chicken fingers. They suck. Over all it's a great atmosphere during the week it's nice and chill. The weekends it get crowded.

POXf5PImmnfKljADU5Le8w.text: Seriously the slowest service you could ever have. ...  If you enjoy waiting 25 minutes for 4 beers and 45 minutes for a couple of wings on a slow afternoon; this place is perfect.  The food and specials are great BUT the attitude and personality of the waitresses brings the place down sooo much. If I could do a half star I would "/.

photos.caption: Photo of Brazwells Premium Pub - Charlotte, NC, United States. Patio seating is pretty clutch

TkFb8lJXBZ9i4p7w5B5JYw.text: Horrible. 5 in our party. Waitress wouldn't take all of our orders at the same time and disappeared after taking each individual order. Went to the front to get a drink, waitress with glasses was very rude. I asked for manager and she laughed and said she had no idea where he was. Never again!

MeDHjydcDLuW_PIlOIIReQ.text: Kelsey recommended the wings with a combination dry rub and sauce. They were awesome. This bar is the best hangout in Charlotte. And Kelsey is one hell of a bartender. Great food and great drinks and atmosphere.

tZ4Kzc5_pdT5CYiU382llQ.text: Fun atmosphere, a little loud for my preference, but no louder than any other venue on the street. We had tuna app, buffalo chicken wrap, and Cobb salad. All were delicious and served in a timely manner. I would go back, for both a bar scene and dinner.

E250vm3tVJ0ayLR4SYPk4w.text: I have only come here at night so I only know how the nightlife is, no idea what the food is like.   The back patio is really nice on summer nights, it does get packed so if you want to get a table I suggest coming early. They have the usual drinks and there are a few bars in the restaurant. One side and 2 outside so it is pretty easy to get drinks. They play great music and they have TVs outside so you can catch any game you want.   The service has been great both times I went.   I would definitely suggest this place to come when you want a simi-chill night with friends!

D4V1lQRjHQWZjUsbzvzo1A.text: Brazwell's is hard to beat for an everyday occasion for hanging out with friends or acquaintances.  Their patio is GINORMOUS and it's a hot spot for young 20- and 30-somethings as well as a neighborhood watering hole for some of the older crowd.  The crowd reflects the staff--cool and laid back which is a welcome breath of fresh air from spots around town that try to be something they're not.    Brazwells is the kind of place you could meet up with anybody from a first date to your roommate's crazy Uncle Ed visiting the big city for the first time.  Some call it the Whiskey Warehouse of Montford (same owners).  Sandwiches, salads and meatloaf aren't supposed to be this good at a sports bar.  The prime rib sandwich and sweet salmon salad are excellent.  The wings are average, but still good.  The atmosphere is the best part about this place, the more I go the more I enjoy it.    There's a lot of variety from during the week (don't be surprised if it's packed on a random Tuesday or Wednesday), during the day on the weekend and on Thu/Fri/Sat nights when it's typically standing room only.    Oh, and don't forget half priced wine bottle Tuesdays!

UnY9c0H7ZygpseChUtlYQQ.text: The food was decent, but the service was subpar. We had a group of 18 people and it took over an hour to get our food orders. Then when we were ready to leave it took over 40 minutes to get our checks. The checks came out wrong and the MOD was full of excuses. The waitress was great but she needed some help. Her manager wasn't great at backing her up. Because we took so long to get serviced another groups time was pushed back.

exeWpCVcl-ejKNFrcfXO_w.text: I eat lunch here regularly and the food is good.  One of my favorites on their menu is the seared tuna sandwich.  If you like tuna, it's one of the best sandwiches in Charlotte.  I've also had their salads, wings and burgers and they are very good as well.      I have had the chance to visit it late night yet, but have been after work for a drink or two and it's a very laid back atmosphere!  There is a digital juke box so there is always good music playing in the back round!  The outside patio is also very cool, great place to have a drink when the weather cools down!  On the inside, they have a ton of TVs on the walls to watch any game that may be on.

photos.caption: Photo of Brazwells Premium Pub - Charlotte, NC, United States. Seared Sesame Tuna Sandwich
Photo of Brazwells Premium Pub - Charlotte, NC, United States. Pimento Cheese Burger

ZsfpiYERLoaT-rpWQTjAdg.text: It's a bar. There are tons of TVs to watch games and bar food to fill your belly. Service and prices are both on par. Nothing to rave about in either way.

XUISjKFWkiH-lFhWWqzcUw.text: I went to Braswell's today for lunch had the best service ever from the bartender Tammy she is a sweetheart! I definitely will be going back!

yOU_6KMk5_WS-qD21rPinQ.text: I'd never been here before and my sweetie & I decided to try it for lunch.  I  was really glad we did.  I didn't see the inside of Brazwell's as we went straight to the patio.  It's lovely, quietly populated (during Memorial Day Monday lunch) & well-shaded!    They have a great outdoor bar area & lots of seating.  Lots of good TV's on patio which is nice for various sporting shows.  The menu was varied and was much better than standard bar fare.  We tried the wings (a lb is about 8 wings) which were ok.  I like others better, but these weren't bad.  I had the salmon salad which was really good.  Not necessarily the freshest, but cooked really well and tasty.  The chicken sandwich was very juicy & tasty.  Skins on fries aren't my favorite.  They're saved a bit by being skinny ones.  They could save them a bit more if they crisped them up a bit more.  All in all...above average food for a good sports bar.  Servers were experienced, which is a plus.  I'd go again.

JNdL5G1j98KZef2Wxt44hA.text: By far the best Bloody Mary bar, I have been to in Charlotte!!!! A group of girls and I try a different place once a month for brunch. Only one of us got" brunch food", but she loved it. The others got wings, for football. The bloody mary bar made everything worth well.....

jUcUD7TqvxLT62lGjeG8dA.text: Worst food I have had in a very long time. Ordered chicken sandwich and chicken was either cooked in a microwave or prepped day before and cooked again in microwave. I couldn't bite through it. When I took my first bite of cole slaw I didn't even chew since it was so spoiled. Waitress saw me spit it out and immediately cleared and got the manager.   Wait staff and Manager were great and I advised them to get a new job since there was no wait at 7pm on a Saturday. Go to cow fish and wait two hours.   Brazzwells kicked me while I was in town on a layover after driving home 16 hrs after a great vacation. Stay away!

0a14OJWaPrL1cld84ud-BQ.text: The food at Brazwells is always good and extremely consistent. The service on the other hand is spotty. The girls are always chatting with one another or busy flirting with the patrons. I do love coming and sitting outside for brunch on the weekends but just be ready to wait 10-15 before someone comes and brings you water and takes your drink order. I will be back (probably this weekend) but this is one of those restaurants where patience is a virtue but worth it for the food, drink specials and patio atmosphere.

Z9sthb0yzSiSULC4kWylxw.text: Salmon BLT is on point. Patio is great. Service is something to be desired, so don't go if you're in a hurry. Sunday brunch is a good place to start. Can be filled with the hipster-millennial types but that's what Montford has turned in to. Give it a try.

LiDb69Jkq--yYeoeJWG8pQ.text: This place is awesome!  Great food and excellent service. I just had their watermelon salad w/ arugula - truly delicious, fresh, and filling.  EXCELLENT

lH71J-Tyu14tiYYTuJiFWQ.text: Great service at brazwells today. Bartender Tammy was wonderful. She serviced our whole party better than anyone ever has. Be sure to try Jaunita's special bean dip! 5 stars!!!

5vP-A-4NAfqVhmB9_HNZ3A.text: Love coming here!  Always great service and food!  We usually come here during the week.  The buffalo chicken salad is amazing as well as the buffalo chicken wrap.  Sundays are 1/2 price wings too!

ia3UBybMyONA23b9wUwqkQ.text: Wings were awesome!  Bartender (Kelsey) was super cool, we had a great time chatting with her. Definitely heading back.

rXOX3_Qel8JyIgqPfP0maQ.text: Since my usual watering hole is closed on Mondays, I was looking for something new and someone recommended Brazwell's.    The first problem with any business on Montford is the parking situation but I lucked out here and found the last space in their lot.    Inside, I wasn't really greeted.  There were two girls standing at the hostess booth chatting away.  Finally they just looked at me like "How dare you interrupt us" and I mentioned I'd just go to the bar.  This place reminds me of a Cheers-type place with lots of dark woods, some brick and then TV's galore around the inside.  Unlike my experience at the front door, my experience at the bar was quite different.  The bartender was friendly and helpful with the menu and the beer selection.  My usual disappointment came with craft beer.....OMB is the only local beer represented here but I branched out of my comfort zone a little with other craft beer options.  The bartender also pointed out that before 6pm is 1/.2 price appetizers and wings.  Wings are by the pound with 8 wings per pound.  I went with 2 lbs of wings with a Buffalo cajun ranch sauce and something called Barbalo which is a barbecue/buffalo mixture.    The wings were big and juicy and lightly covered is sauce, just the way I like them.  Unfortunately, they missed the mark on spice level.  But there's plenty of other menu options to explore on this menu.    Overall, I enjoyed the atmosphere and the bartender.  I would give the place another shot.

o6CdGoBk1bLKvP-Au0mdIg.text: Amazing! Hands down best place in Charlotte. Great food, great atmosphere and the staff is the best! John the manager is the nicest guy in the world! I will be back every day for the rest of my life!

U4sMiu7oylinVeXA-ocbbw.text: Service always seems slow when we are here to eat. Usually on Saturdays they offer $2 mimosas. Wings are good and huge. My fiance loves the Bloody Mary bar on Sunday's. One time me and my fiance came with 2 of his friends. I'm Asian and he's white. One of his friends is white and the other was Asian. We sat at a high top table at the bar. I was sitting next to my fiance and his white friend with his Asian friend across from me. The female bartender asked if we were ready for the checks but didn't ask how they were split. I guess since she assumed I was Asian, I was with the Asian guy even though I wasn't sitting next to him. She put our checks together and my fiance and his friend separate. Really? That's pretty rude and ignorant. When my fiance told her we were on one check she just said "oh" without apologizing.

lmDf6DamCryO7ihR_I6r2A.text: Well, heard good things but the female staff are in 'leggings as pants' which any woman knows are not pants...tacky and cheap. Decided not to order food...Wine list is for those who don't know wine. Popular Malbec from a few years ago...figured that was their best option. Will go next door to eat. And yes my wine glass was not clean... Ewww. Cheap and nasty.

photos.caption: Photo of Brazwells Premium Pub - Charlotte, NC, United States. Oil queso served like this - so salty it tastes as nasty as it looks

VCUtCo7JAOfDST96Y6o0ZA.text: Great environment and amazing food! My waitress Kellen was very nice and respectful and was always checking on my table, pleasant experience!!

pUywU_ib4EBYx0lllt04oQ.text: Got to experience this place as we decided to come here for a drink while we waited on our table at Good Food. I'm less than pleased with the service. Our waitress was fine at first but when the rest of our party arrived it was a sudden attitude change. We opted to sit on the patio since we were just going to stay for drinks. When we decided to stay for dinner the service completely went down hill. Our waitress would ask if we needed anything and before we could even get a chance to respond she responded, "no, okay good" and walk off. We all looked around at each other because a majority of us either had a question or needed something. As for my meal, I ordered the veggie wrap with a side of veggies. The waitress said, "You realize the veggies on the side are the same in the wrap? I figured this was the case but didn't expect the attitude so I responded, "I figured, lets doubt that veggie intake." We got our meals, but not all at the same time. 2 of the people in our group did not receive their meal with everyone else and ended up waiting at least 10-15 mins later. The price for meal was fine, but the service really killed the experience. My only advice for anyone coming here, don't sit in Alana's section. I really hope she was just having an off night and that's not her normal attitude. Two stars were absolutely for the food and price.

EygAJroWbr6RigtZnlDK5Q.text: So the wait staff is full of nacho ninja's (i.e. we had a few lone chips sitting on the once bountiful nacho plate and they kept trying to take our plate away even though we were still working on them). A bit of a turn off if you ask me. Another turn off is when I am thirsty and can't get a drink in a timely manner and when our server takes our cards to pay the tab and doesn't come back for a good 15 minutes letting us think that she skated off to South Park mall to go on a shopping spree.  Nice patio though, it was bumping for a random 70 degree weekend day in Charlotte but the crowd sure enough changed to the trite early 20's crowd with too many popped pastel colored collars for my liking. Food was decent--as stated before we started off with the nachos which were surprisingly delicious and I had the buffalo shrimp appetizer. They had wallet friendly drink specials, lots of room in the back and a great selection of food but I think if I were to come back, it would be for the day drinking aspect alone.

Photo of Brazwells Premium Pub - Charlotte, NC, United States. Buffalo shrimp

9rkT397UOwLHyY7KjDmADQ.text: What the is the point of having a phone number if nobody answers it??   I called on my way here twice, and called while I was sitting at the bar and I dont hear a ringer.   I just wanted to call in a late night food order so I didn't have to wait for it.

NbZYekp536nCpUZDxRZSsA.text: The back patio is nice. Lots of tv's, tables, and corn hole. Sandwiches were good, decent portion size. Friendly staff.  Beer specials. Will probably go back when back up in Charlotte.

XTvKsfRikWcE32CDqy2d_A.text: I had some pretty terrible experiences here in the past for the night life scene. However it's a great place to watch football on Sunday with the Bloody Mary bar! Food is pretty typical for bar food but the atmosphere is fun and the back porch is always fun!

d4blgR2EWOWX2YIZVyDMIA.text: The lemon pepper wings are the best in Charlotte.   Kelsey is an amazing bartender.  Highly recommended.   J

xmiyx4FV5Fpg5Apb1eeKZQ.text: Went here for lunch with a buddy. I ordered their version of a Chicken Philly - pretty standard - it was sub par along with the steamed broccoli (raw). If you don't know how to steam broccoli or prepare a chicken Philly acceptably - why are you in the food business? We waited approx 20 minutes for a burger (buddy ordered burger and green beans side) and I, a chicken Philly. Not only did we wait too long, the food was barely edible, AND there is a dollar up-charge to get something other than fries - so my broccoli and my buddy's green beans - a dollar extra for barely prepared sides. You soooooo deserve this rating Braswell's. I won't be back.

xb8m6LAjGzSdqKr2hbBvlg.text: Honestly the most rude place I have ever ate. We decided to sit here and eat after a long wait and Good Food. Our server was a ghost and was extremely rude when bothered to get something we constantly had to ask for. Also they literally cleaned our stuff off the table while our personal belongings were still on it to clear it for the night and when we said we still were eating the bouncer said well it sure didn't look like. I will never step foot in this place again.

6CSoD_TMvdlrxRpAlMhUrA.text: Go here on Sunday if you are hung over enough to need a good Bloody Mary. You'll inevitably feel creepy staring at your waitress' butt, but it's ok, God forgives you.  Overal: B

o7gGJWxuHkcs_ArAkJqTXw.text: Brazwell's and there staff there were really cool.  Nice big patio out back, lots off beers on tap, staff always there to check up on ya.  And a must in any decent bar in NC, AIR CONDITIONED!!!!  Ahhhhhh!  Tasty snacks - the manager found out we were from out of town and brought us a sampler of the local favorite - fried pickles.  Thanks man, but I'll stick with your awesome nachos and New Belgium beers on tap.

fvqHA1L-XJucNZ6r9TzfaQ.text: Another great chill place to hang. Depending on the time of day the vibe can change but the food is great, awesome drinks, lots of servers and bartenders, (most of them very attractive and friendly) and just a comfortable place to hang. Try the Sunday brunch and have the pico chicken, the wings are good, most sandwiches are great, and it's just a very comfortable place. Out back is a great deck to chill or inside with lots of TV's for sporting events.  Montford is the hottest spot in the city these days and Brazwell's started the boom. And I saw an average review of a burger but apparently the writer didn't have the southern burger with cole slaw and chili. YUMMY.  I hope to go back this weekend.

NLc3ZJSsbvcumHsopghDdA.text: This is one of my favorite neighborhood spots.  It is a fun bar with a great outdoor space and the food is definitely a cut above bar food with a variety of choices.  For example, try the salmon salad. This salad is really big and very filling.  If you are really hungry and like it a little spicy, try the buffalo chicken sandwich - it is huge and very tasty.  Don't forget to try to fried pickles too!

gNn0q5673zirQWTa5-rXsA.text: Every time I turn around, Charlotte surprises me with another gem; this place is cool!!  Def a bar atmosphere, but they have a really awesome patio.  Great food & even better beer selection; I love how they list their top-shelf booze!

hKmV1PKCFwCjUxBYErZSkg.text: Was invited to Brazwells to watch a match of the World Cup.  The atmosphere is really great.  if you're looking for an intimate (as in smaller and can get loud) place to watch sports, this is the place.  Lot's of screens, seats are comfortable for an hour+ of seating, and the food is pretty good.  I didn't have anything to drink because of the hour but I did have the nachos which were incredible.  It was enough to hold three of us over for lunch.    Yeah, I'll be back.

tZ6fmdq_t9NG_3PRT1Hdkg.text: Since my last review they have cleaned house of the rude waitresses and the staff is great now. However, management quit offering a side salad and now only offer a giant size. Managers! Please bring back the smaller side salad. It is costing you business cause now we don't order any salad. Bummer!

n_WAXc8qw-73OB9jWCOhmQ.text: I'm been going to Brazwells for a couple of years now and always get good service by the staff.  The food is surprisingly good for a pub.  I love the outdoor patio area when the weather is nice.  Great place to watch sports.

DI0ZDRfYF_sO7oj_69Y-rA.text: This is a fair spot. Solid patio experience, but pretty loud inside - you're gonna get DJ'ed on Friday for sure. It was slammed when I went, with the usual suspects in Charlotte (a lot of attractive ladies around on the Friday I went, with the requisite number of button-up shirted dudes in tow). My friends mentioned that the Montford area was filling up because Uptown (as people in Charlotte call downtown) was becoming less attractive. So, apparently it's always like that. Service wasn't necessarily slow, but we were in a booth and no one served us. If you don't mind a crowd and mostly standing, not a bad place - particularly if you live in the South Park area.

03mW9YhpoVZQB8jrHCG5_Q.text: Pretty good chill out spot on Montford. Never had the food, but the bartenders are usually pretty good, moderately priced drinks, inside can get crowded at times, especially on the weekends. Only thing I don't like is the DJ, THE DJ HERE IS TERRIBLE, please for the love of god do not play 'the thong song' its dead let it die. The music is turned up way too loud for a bar like that and he just plays your stereotypical early 2000s party mix. I know people don't come here for the music, but please at least try and provide our ears with something decent.

evJMKepA6Jz0iP1OuduGbA.text: Great place for Happy Hour! We typically go here either to start or end the night, and it can get pretty packed. Cornhole on the deck is clutch, and this place is the best for watching NFL games. They have a bloody mary bar on Sundays and tons of TV's. Never a problem watching the games here.

2DUYRSA5FXw28r32AVU88A.text: I never had the food here, but usually stop by for a few drinks. In the summer this place is always packed.   During the winter its a lot slower with a mix of people from young to over 50.  Sometimes the place makes you feel like you should have dressed up, but other times I feel like crusty sweatpants and stained wife beater is acceptable attire.  This is the reason I have given this place 3 stars as opposed to 4.   It seems a little lack luster in the inside and its not really defined what type of bar this is.

Z8Mk7FMRyEUOPjFEfyxmvA.text: The place looks like a nicer level of sports bar. The service and food were good. The noise level was high as there was a game one the many televisions and a lot of chatter.

_RoLyFaOoLteuwBUM4JIbQ.text: Popular bar on Montford with a great back deck.  I was there on a Fri night and it got pretty packed with a young, 20 something crowd.  There isn't much special about the place beyond the deck.  Beers are typical, service is average, people in abundance.

D2eBv0GRnZi4PhZxry6MuQ.text: Brazwells is simply a great time. I love going there in the summer and hanging out on the back deck. They have good drinks and pretty good bar food. No matter what the night there is always a good amount of people in there. They also have good sports trivia there as well.

9PnsPJx033sde4tl8_ykEA.text: Went for the first time last week.  Great patio.  As far as food, only had nachos.  Wow I cant believe restaurants use cheese wiz.  Come on lets use some real cheese please !

UOH4vNKt6tbG10iuVR5gxQ.text: Cool bar/atmosphere with a great outdoor deck.  Food is ok, not great.

HLBS8PJhw8tcTl0NKxtnGQ.text: Go here for amateur night for sure!  You might as well be hanging out at a chain bar with drunken frat boys and mini-skirts crooning to Top 40.  I guess Bar Charlotte is back....only on Montford.  I'd have a better time at Applebee's Bar & Grill.

UdGrFbptEvF_S7tVRHkjpA.text: Came by right at opening for Saturday brunch. Our party of 4 was seated on the patio. Our waitress was friendly but as the patio quickly filled up she seemed a little flustered trying to take care of most of the tables. Which was odd as when I walked through the restaurant to go to the restroom I saw a couple groups of employees lounging and hanging out. The slow service was fine as I like to take my time during brunch. The brunch drink specials are out of this world. $4 Bloody Mary bar and $2 mimosas, I ordered one of each and both were great. My husband ordered the french toast with grits and I ordered the salmon BLT. My sandwich was great, the salmon was well cooked and I loved the arugula and aioli, it was very tasty. Hub's grits were out of this world, maybe the best I've ever had. The other couple we were with got an omelette and the chicken and waffles and they both loved the food. 5 stars on the food and 3 for the staff. Will definitely be back for another lovely morning on the patio.

1X07Qno89DR3qQJ8wAKtAg.text: Atmosphere was very enjoyable our waitress was fantastic. Julie who just came down from Rhode Island is very personable had great suggestions and what a sweet personality. Enjoyed the experience. Will definitely be back and recommend to friends and colleagues.

ufTzpYEL9QcquO5zwurQLA.text: They only get one star and that's for the staff. Everything was awful. It took about 20 mins to get our food and when we did it was barely warm, the fries were cold and soggy and they charged extra for a side of honey mustard. Like pretty much place on Montford, the parking sucks.

yxDE_wVvgdwqft9TrUnuPQ.text: absolutely loved this place! Not only was the pimento cheese burger out of this world, but the service I received here was one of the best I have ever had!   Heaven was my server & she was very informative, quick to take care of us, and she kept a smile on her face the whole entire time! Will definitely be back! Thank you guys!!

0lTr4tMV14Z76XPB_DToDA.text: Although it is a bar setting, the burger I got with Pimento cheese was amazing. The fries were good and the ranch (if I remember correctly) is thin and so yummy. The service was okay, our server looked lost most of the time and walked away before we could finish asking her for everything we felt we needed, such as extra napkins, refills, etc which made her look like she was running around. Over all, this place is a solid three stars.

3SfwZf7QumHZbsbqZuUrFw.text: Visiting from Australia when I stumbled upon Brazwells and have to say I am glad I did. A wonderful experience, both dining and from a hospitality perspective. Started with the fried pickles (a totally foreign and new concept to me) and have to say pleasantly surprised. Continued with the buffalo chicken salad, which was very tasty and filling and of course topped it off with a few beers. The waitress (Gina) was outstanding - efficient, ultra-friendly, sociable and overall pleasant to be around. No request was too hard or not done in a timely manner. A real asset to your establishment. Sat on the big patio out back which really topped the day off. I will definitely be back next time I am in the US.

PuYsu_SwDYfBcocOemxM4g.text: One of my favorite places to go in Charlotte. Montford and brazzwells are tops in my book. Kelsey is by far the best bartender in Charlotte period. Easy going, friendly and a pleasure to be around. I highly recommend.

photos.caption: Photo of Brazwells Premium Pub - Charlotte, NC, United States

5VQGNAdmhbK4QTAgMRYG7g.text: What a great location to watch soccer or hang out with friends on their patio. It is a smoke-friendly patio, drinks are good and the staff is friendly. Their restrooms are clean and the location has plenty of seats. I hear they also have live music on the weekend. I have not been there for that but I will have to try it out soon. The location is def. amazing and sitting out on the patio on the weekend is super relaxing.

u5yUdLafglq2eUyMjLqTDA.text: I had such an amazing experience at brazwells! The drinks were on point, food was amazing, but better than all else was the superior service. Darienne was an amazing bartender and so attentive. The front of house manager, Megan, was such a pleasure and so helpful. Amazing staff all around. Will be back!

5dQTO0t03ZIfWeHDxXkFdw.text: Love Brazwells Sunday brunch! We come here every week we are in town for the great food and drink specials. Emma is a wonderful waitress who is always very helpful and accommodating! Highly recommend Brazwells on Sunday's.

mOXKfXcSikvFwhqMQirnIA.text: Great food, great atmosphere! Service is good, would definitely recommend. Plenty of specials every day of the week. My roommate and I went on a Monday and really enjoyed ourselves.

-rmwytuCbq4SC5AK4RKQRA.text: Last night was an off night with time however the place is so consistent it did not bother us. Just wanted to point out when the food is always good and the service is always good a bad night keeps loyal customers coming back. Overall highly recommend this place. Great food, great prices and great specials. If you have had a bad experience there it's rare give it another try!  Well can't take up for them anymore just keeps getting worse 4-24-16

rxJ-eBfGcNeFeqWBPAXOyA.text: I have heard this is a good place to go drink at night on the weekends.... Well keep it that way!! Me and some girlfriends went out there to get a quick lunch and we had the worst experience. The waitress was the worst! It was pretty slow and It took forever for us to get menus, took 30min before she took our order, she gave us an open half empty bottle of wine and the list goes on.... Hopefully it was just the bad waitress our visit was so unpleasant.

K-RH9iZ7WuEK4JfgPbLyww.text: Been coming here for a few years. Always a good time and great atmosphere. Just got the best waitress Kayle! She steps it up! Awesome service, good food, good music, and good people.

iiKB15NUGMszaE8JR_W7mA.text: I was in town for the week and stopped in for a quick bite to eat. They had me at, "Hello." Brazwells is ME: from the decor to the energy; food offerings to the actual taste; cleanliness to the en pointe service. I loved it.   Our bartender Kelsey was so helpful in deciding what eat/drink. She was very informative and so much fun! We had such a lovely experience that we had to go back one more time before we left NC!!   Will definitely be back on my next visit!

u3wfDk862iG-aCrOqGdH4Q.text: Meh- just your very underwhelming hangout in Charlotte. I give them props for the patio and the $4 Bloody Mary bar, as well as decent mimosa prices. The food is very underwhelming and a little high price for what you actually get. What really got me was the service... we waited ten minutes to be greeted, while we were standing right behind an employee with her back to us on her phone the whole time. Just don't really care to give businesses to places where the servers don't care. Nothing horrible at all and I may return solely for the Bloody Mary bar, but otherwise, just plenty of other places in Charlotte.

PoY0JVWARIPH36tpI7Oi2w.text: After writing a review at Brazwells Restaurant in uptown Charlotte, NC I was contacted by a manager to reach out to him with his contact information provided. I emailed him right away! Got no response at all. I was then verbally abused by worker at the establishment via Facebook! She was threatening me that things would happen if I didn't take the post down!!!!! Out of control! Contacting the counties health services dept first thing Monday morning!!!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Brazwells Premium Pub - Charlotte, NC, United States. Their fries were undercooked and cold!!!! Someone call the health dept!!!!!!
Photo of Brazwells Premium Pub - Charlotte, NC, United States. This is a worker verbally attacking me and using profanity on social media after I left a review!!!!!! #BottleCapGroup

EwXxwILe4GEneY0tVVJSKg.text: Ok Brazwells, you little devil...you suckered me in with your Monday special:    Half Price Wings  The setup is pretty cool, a few booths, tables and chairs and tons of tvs behind the bar.  The location is small and like the previous reviews have mentioned parking is a bit of a challenge.  You order wings by the pound which I think is awesome! I was pleased that they had such a good variety of flavors outside of just the usual Hot and Mild. They also had  Lemon Pepper, Garlic Parmesan, Spicy Teriyaki, Buffalo Cajun Ranch and Sriracha just to name a few. I went with the Lemon Pepper and Spicy Teriyaki. My favorite hands down were the Lemon Pepper. They were hot and juicy with just the right amount of flavor and kick.   My main issue is the service. It's spotty at best. We spent a good amount of time waiting for our waitress or looking for her (which I hate). But the wings will bring me back. Let's just hope I can score a good parking space and booth!

h2BQgYJ5JX5l_ij8luU3wg.text: This is in reference to the below link regarding my friends experience. He was pushed into a bouncer by a girl and accidentally stepped on his shoe. She was clearly more intoxicated than my friend and he was probably one of the more sober people in the bar. While we both tried to apologize to the bouncer, he would not even listen to us and was actually pretty aggressive. He made sure to tell us that he didn't care about the girl and how she was acting, but more upset about his shoe. We were there to celebrate a birthday and have a good time, and this has completely ruined our opinion of this place and we will not be coming back. yelp.com/biz/brazwells-p...

IKfH1HghXLFtppY0AHVqow.text: Not a bad place for a burger and fries, but if you get the seared tuna wrap, don't expect for it to be seared. With the wrap, expect a fully cooked piece of tuna.

Po-zopGVJziu2g9hxm3C9A.text: Visited this Pub yesterday evening; and I was very impressed. I've been here before and I only sat in the patio, however last night was the day before my best friends birthday and the bartender Ashley was the best! Nice and Strong and her customer service was outstanding. When we left floating on cloud nine we said we will come back again. I also recommend you to try the buffalo shrimp!!

RDXHSdM5qh7M0uCSVx-y8w.text: I give them 2 stars, simply for putting up with my drunk friend wobbling around(Not loud or anything) and not kicking us out. Other than that, this place was a fail. Service was super slow, our waitress forgot to put our order in, then when she did, everything was wrong! Most of our order was pretty much someone else's when it came out because it was so wrong. I was not impressed with my steak. It was explained to be marinated with Teriyaki with island spices and flavors with pineapples. The Steak had no flavor. Maybe they tried to cook it in Teriyaki last minute and the sauce just burned off? I don't know, but it was definitely not marinated as described. I definitely would not return for the food.

photos.caption: Photo of Brazwells Premium Pub - Charlotte, NC, United States. Teriyaki Steak

cWCFSd7Y8WowpkDGvgUdGQ.text: I think the experience at Brazwells is pretty consistent. They have a ton of TV's, a big bar area and a full menu. They always have cheap drink specials in addition to the regularly stocked bottles, cans, draft beers, wines and liquors. The service has always been good when I've been there--they seem pretty well adjusted to the large crowds that can pack in on the weekends. Location is great, a fun area with multiple bars and restaurants in the area.   I've heard the bloody mary bar is awesome, looking forward to checking it out!

dG1H2LsOVIXieG3mpNhbfA.text: This is a very cool, hip place to grab a bite or drink. People are friendly and wait staff was great.  Parking lot is small so that was a pain.  Prices are reasonable.   I ordered the Buffalo Chicken Sandwich and it was bad. That's the only reason I gave 4 out of 5 stars. It was mostly bun and lettuce and the chicken itself wasn't that great. The French fries were awesome though.   And the scenery was amazing...

Rf-vTZddWqCjNeASO9adQw.text: This is an ok stop for a quick drink while waiting for a table at Good Food.  It's a bar...bar bar. So the atmosphere is that of a bar.  Haha! If that makes sense.  They have drink specials on different days, which is nice to see.  Weekend mimosa and Bloody Mary specials are definitely worth checking out!  The staff is overall friendly, can sometimes be a hit or miss.  The place does get really busy at times.   Food is very bar-like, nothing really out of the ordinary.  Never had a bad experience here.

PPybRvJhWAYFS24T-GVyIQ.text: They have the best red bull specials on Monday night. Sung is the coolest person up there, well Trevor kinda cool too. Ok I love waffles bye

photos.caption: Photo of Brazwells Premium Pub - Charlotte, NC, United States

MhzpYnOZt1kxxiXnsk0ZdQ.text: I have to admit this is a pretty chill place. We came here not really knowing what to expect but it's really hipster and reminds me of other places we like to go. It was a cloudy day and it started to rain outside, people who were eating kind of just got stuck out there, I'm sure that sucked. We ordered a round of shots and it came in little plastic cups, I guess it's more efficient, just seemed a little off putting. I can see this place getting crowded fast. But, I'd definitely come back.

O9sJqc9FsGhTg-tHnywytw.text: One Of My Favorite Bars.  Great Drink Specials And Good Food!  Definitley A Great Value For Your Dollar.  Staff Is Friendly And Usually A Pretty Good Crowd Dor Socializing.

gl3oY96XW4GB8pDEK30W3Q.text: Loved the $5 hamburger special on Monday night, unfortunately I asked for medium-rare and got well-done. Other times the food was good, casual atmosphere. Meets our expectations.

3jk7Ngwdk7DB_fGGnSNNNA.text: Waitresses are very nice! And very hot too My wife and go usually on weekend nights. We like the tuna and spring roll appetizers the best  They have an updated menus with nice plates, my wife and I also enjoy the Tuesday wine special, and you go around 6:00 you can enjoy happy hour apps

photos.caption: Photo of Brazwells Premium Pub - Charlotte, NC, United States. Fish and chips

-N8Y4725YJsrzMIjqSuHFA.text: Not bad, not great. Awesome location though! We sat outside and I love their patio section. The set up is neat and they allow dogs! We were pretty low maintenance on this visit but our service was still really good.  My boyfriend had the cheeseburger & fries, which he said was delicious. I didn't try his burger but the fries were veryyy good. I ordered the chicken nachos on this particular visit. The nachos were overall, meh. I love a good plate of nachos so I was somewhat disappointed. They do have a great drink selection, which was a plus. If half stars were an option I would say overall 3.5 rating. We'll definitely go back, but I'll be trying something else for my meal.

photos.caption: Photo of Brazwells Premium Pub - Charlotte, NC, United States. Chicken nachos.

Yj9Gjts98nk9FNR5kohbcw.text: This place is perfect. I love coming here the food, the atmosphere, the bartenders are great. One of my favorite weekend spots.

7IZRy--GC4F82kiMxdn1Bg.text: Three words: Bloody Mary bar. They literally don't skimp on the liquor and have the best options to make the best Bloody Mary. It is a bit cramped and I wish they had more seating but food is always worth the claustrophobia

8hqK8c4ATW7Wd8-wEYaE7A.text: Visiting friend in Charlotte and jumped around to multiple bars having a great time. When we came to  Brazwells, we thought it was a fun place to watch the fight. We came early and got seats on a bench in the middle of the inside bar. After watching the fight for an hour, a bouncer came up to us and said we had to leave our seat because "a customer" wanted our seat - no contact from the actual "customer". Upon 5 of us leaving, one girl took our spot at a large bench. We had been buying drinks throughout the entire time we were there. All the bartenders were very kind and wish we could've enjoyed ourselves, but the treatment by the bouncer was never apologetic or curious. Because of this we will not be returning.

6lRHeCfD1KCiEdr2aAgGkA.text: This is my wife's account: I went here with her because she said it was a popular spot. A girl came in trying to terry tate me because I was in her path. I didn't jump out of the way so she pushed me into a bouncer.   Unintentionally, I step on his foot. Another bouncer joined him to start something. I get it, they deal with a lot unruly drunk people,  but I tried to apologize to the guy. He continued to carry on to save his ego. I left, and will never go back.

cHQnkDfkMwwyYxyyH12gQg.text: Staff was rude, only had 2 beers then decided to go somewhere else and heard the Bartender talking loudly to her other coworker about the "big 2 dollar tip" she was going to get from us. Food menu looked decent and wasn't that packed for a football Sunday which is a plus. One thing that stuck with me even after the bartender with the attitude was that we didn't get a warm welcome when you walk through the door.

6McONpVx7vbKGs7_d5Oq5Q.text: I don't usually write reviews, but I feel compelled to write about my great experience today. Taking shelter from the hurricane and watching football with the guys. How lucky we are to be served by Heaven. She is attentive, charming, and fun. Food is great, the beer is cold. Heaven is amazing!

UcL1gUMasPnFgseFbcDFJA.text: Great place to grab a beer and something to eat. The servers are really friendly and attentive. Plenty of wide screen tv's to watch the game or any other sporting event. Last time we stopped a new girl Haley was our server and she did a super job! Very friendly and personable. We definitely will go back!

XrK7IDwSlLzWewMOqzFwRQ.text: Great food, awesome atmosphere! My girlfriends and I came here for the first time on a Friday. We ordered the spinach dip which was delicious and $3 Sangrias! They do not cut corners on their sangrias - we were wine drunk by the end of the night lol. Each of us ordered something different. I ordered the Smokehouse burger with sweet potato fries. Aaah! So damn good! The fries have a brown sugar/cinnamon sprinkle on it which gives it a wonderful sweet taste. The burger was over cooked than what I originally asked (well done vs. medium well) but it was still good and juicy.

photos.caption: Photo of Brazwells Premium Pub - Charlotte, NC, United States. Smokehouse burger, sweet potato fries and sangria

z4FBoDOIVhdnW_WR9oDHVg.text: This is the spot for watching games or chillin on the patio with friends. Alex is the best server!

x8R1gmHk6LFeq44gwhQCjg.text: So last night me and the girlies decided to go here for thirsty Thursday, and got that Sun Drop it like it's Hot slushee. We decided to have a contest to see who could finish there's first. BAD IDEA! LOL I felt like that Weekend song ( I cant feel my face when I'm with you) Overall the drinks were stiff like I like my men but the service was slow like my kids  -Karen

Photo of Brazwells Premium Pub - Charlotte, NC, United States. Sun Drop it Like it&#39;s Hot

pK86SiBeEN7ulJSCnuVdqA.text: I have been coming here since they opened on Montford.  This is typical bar food yet they do a few things well.  The patio is a feature they have done well here.  Enjoy it now before the humidity and summer days come racing in.  Currently, I eat here with a group regularly for Friday lunch.  My go to are the salads.  My go to's are the sweet salmon or the house with salmon, chicken or shrimp.  I have had salmon that had a stronger than usual fishy taste and smell so I'm hesitant to order the salmon at times. This past Friday I decided to change it up and order the buffalo chicken grilled salad, not fried. It was okay.  The chicken tenders were small and have no flavor.  Hardly enough sauce to taste the buffalo.  I had forgotten from a previous order not to do this again but to order a grilled chicken salad and order a side of buffalo and blue cheese to toss in.

1g206ziY_A6CzZXc7D4wxg.text: The takeaway from this place- average. BUT... so much potential, and I'm pulling for this place! I like the divey and patio part of the bar- it's just missing some energy at times. (Especially during the week days when the blonde pregnant bartender is working- seems to not want to be there.)  Food is pretty good and so is the TV set up. Night time bartenders are pretty friendly and very "put together".  Servers seem to hustle pretty well. Strive to be THE BEST and not just mediocre. I'm pulling for ya ladies and gents.....

8ocPKX0fgc7H_qRybI2WVQ.text: Located on the busy Montford Rd Bar stretch, parking here can be a doozy.  If at all possible, Uber or Lyft here.    They have Indoor seating and  a great deck for outdoor seating with sunny and shady spots, lots of tvs and a plethora of adult beverages, so the perfect spot to watch games on tv. Very casual atmosphere.    Food is good and they have lunch specials.    Visited on a Friday around lunch time and ordered the fish and chips that was the daily special. Oh my heavens - the fish was lightly battered but absolutely  so fresh and delicious, who would've thought!!?! The fish was served with fries that were seasoned - very worth the $10.  On this day, I also tried their Sundrop Slushie!  Careful, goes down easy but packs a mean yet sweet punch!  On Saturdays and Sundays, they have $4 Bloody Mary Bar which is phenomenal. They have so many BM mixes, lots of toppings for your MB and the largest olives known to human kind.  You wont go wrong by stopping in and having one or three.  If MB aren't your thing, try their $2 Mimosas on Saturdays. You'll thank me later!

photos.caption: Photo of Brazwells Premium Pub - Charlotte, NC, United States. Red Sangria
Photo of Brazwells Premium Pub - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Brazwells Premium Pub - Charlotte, NC, United States. Sundrop Slushie

ZBr-gbIGXRwM_5bke-DatQ.text: Cool little spot. I ordered the fish and chips, which were pretty decent, nothing to write home about though. The service was good. First time here, not much to say, although a bird did shit on me while I was eating. So...yeah...there's that.

ujF4g-hh9irHekldQhxPcw.text: So met a friend at Brazwells tonight. Usually love this place because of good customer service. Tonight was very slow. Asked manager Jay to put Bachelorette on, final night, I realized it's a sports bar, but following photo, place was all women, very slow night. He said he could loose his job. Really thought owners were more customer oriented.

photos.caption: Photo of Brazwells Premium Pub - Charlotte, NC, United States

hDXEF3A9WZOAPX8EJaK35A.text: Came with a party of 10 and started in app's. Each App was a meal in itself. Buffalo Shrimp and Beef Tips are amazing. Huge shrimp and tender beef. It was well above expectations.

TETz7DNRAkGzjTxW2wdZnQ.text: Stopped by here for a work lunch with some coworkers.  Food is typical bar/pub style food with some Southern influences.  They have daily specials for lunch and drinks specials for after work.  Food quality here was decent and everything was pretty tasty.  Our server was pretty friendly but everyone else there was not too friendly -- seemed like they were being forced to work there, really killed the experience.  Will look elsewhere.
